title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Fishing Services
body: Fishing Services       Listed below are the authorized guide services for the Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area. Click the web address to go to their respective website.      Deep South Fly Anglers 1201 Scandrett Overlook NW Kennesaw, GA 30152 deepsouthflyanglers.com 678-986-9240  Guided fishing trips.         River Through Atlanta 710 Riverside Road Roswell, GA 30075 www.riverthroughatlanta.com 770-650-8630  Guided fishing trips & instruction.
